ygData.subject: Re: JBoots, Rubi & Beyond
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Leave it to Verant to screw something up worse than the problem it was trying to fix (yet again I might add)! Why the hell couldn t they just have made
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Nilen23@...
>
>No its not on the live server yet. They said they'll probably make that in
>this update. Wednsdays. Read the eqnews that downloads from the update for
>wednsday and it will tell you what changed. ALSO. They are no longer having
>rubicite dropped from the creatures that drop it currently. Everyone that
>has
>rubicite will keep it but you will no longer be able to get it.
>

Leave it to Verant to screw something up worse than the problem it was
trying to fix (yet again I might add)! Why the hell couldn't they just have
made rubi no drop????? I'm seriously thinking about quitting now. Rubi was
about the last think my DESK had left to look forward to.
